name: The Child of Santa Claus: A Christmas Miracle - Free
name_original: The Child of Santa Claus: A Christmas Miracle - Free
description:
MAGICAL JOURNEY TO FIND SANTA CLAUS!

IT'S NOT SIMPLE YOU THINK!

A boy got a dream about Santa and he started to find Santa Claus.

This journey is not easy so help boy to find Santa by avoiding obstacles on your way and make sure you collect all stars on your way.

DOWNLOAD THE CHILD OF SANTA CLAUS for FREE now!

Please help us improve them!
